metadata.name: Kebab
metadata.description:
Kebab is a cooked meat dish. 
Read that again. 
Do you see an animal being slaughtered?
That’s what it is!
We’ve got so accustomed to hearing the word ‘meat’
that we have stopped realizing that it is actually a life. 
Holy Cow, is a satire to what cruelty we are accustomed to, in our everyday life.
It is focused on fundraising for my own organization,
The Kind Hour. 
We are a young organization, working for stray dogs in Lucknow. 
We feed, rescue, vaccinate, sterilize and paint doggo murals too! 
Started in 2020,we have rescued more than 450+ animals 
and regularly feed 150 dogs. 
It was my dream to work for animals
and it came with a huge cost!
Rescuing animals got us in a huge medical debt.
Hence, we present our first collection, Holy Cow!
To support our animals and to keep up with our expenses.
100% funds will be utilized in clearing our medical bills and save more lives on ground.
We made a promise which we want to last forever!
Help us!

Our work:
https://linktr.ee/thekindhour
